segments.text: Good evening , may I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . I want to reserve a table for two this evening .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am sorry , madam . All the tables are booked now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . In that case , we will have to go to another restaurant . Thank you all the same .
segments.speaker: S2
